subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Bradley Wiggins of Britain fended off a downhill attack by Cadel Evans in a mountainous fifth stage to retain the yellow jersey in the Critérium du Dauphiné.
snippet: Bradley Wiggins of Britain fended off a downhill attack by Cadel Evans in a mountainous fifth stage to retain the yellow jersey in the Critérium du Dauphiné.
